compounddef.title: WHAT List FreeMat Files In Directory

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Lists files in a directory (or the current directory if no argument is supplied) that are relevant to FreeMat. These are M-files, MAT-files, and class directories. There are several syntaxes for its use. The first is what which lists the aforementioned items. If you provide a path instead what path-to-folder then what will list the relevant FreeMat items in the specified directory.
